title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of QQQ

content.text: The NASDAQ-100 Index Tracking Stock (QQQ) begins trading on the NASDAQ stock exchange.
The first stock split for QQQ occurs, with a 2-for-1 split.
Another stock split for QQQ takes place, this time with a 2-for-1 split.
QQQ undergoes a reverse split, with a 1-for-5 consolidation.
A reverse split of 1-for-4 occurs for QQQ.
QQQ declares a special dividend of $0.15 per share.
Another stock split for QQQ takes place, with a 3-for-1 split.
Two reverse splits occur for QQQ - a 1-for-2 consolidation followed by a 1-for-3 consolidation.
